body_html:
Hi @facaiy ,
as you suggested using _LazyBuilder works. We should not open _LazyBuilder as a public API though.
also sending _LazyBuilder around will complicate the underlying functions.
If you find a way which does not complicate API, would be happy to review it.
nobody is working on it yet. contributions welcome.

body:
Hi @facaiy ,
as you suggested using _LazyBuilder works. We should not open _LazyBuilder as a public API though. 
also sending _LazyBuilder around will complicate the underlying functions. 
If you find a way which does not complicate API, would be happy to review it.
nobody is working on it yet. contributions welcome.
